2.author: Anushree
2.message: I took an appoinment with Monishaji for my friend in 2021. She was going through very tough time with her PhD. At times, she even thought of quitting.She did all the remedies that Monishji had suggested. Now, she is a Doctorate degree holder and the Head of the Department.

3.author: Priyanka Tandon
3.message:
It makes me feel so happy and grateful when I am writing my heartfelt gratitude note for Monisha ma’am. My association with her is long back when she had begun her journey into the spiritual world, and I was still a wanderer. She mentored me through Reiki and guided me and my family at different stages through her tarot readings and remedies. Every time the faith, trust and her guidance rooting from clear intuition, thorough knowledge and compassionate heart was truly beneficial. Years passed, and we stay connected, had a challenging situation at my family, where everything seemed to be falling apart, and I was losing hake and control bath.

Once again I banked on her, and this time once again with her sessions of hypnotherapy and past life regression therapies which were full of deep knowledge the subject. Compassionate heat and clear mind she helped me one by one, step by step. There were many things that were totally new to us but. It all happened before us. Surprising, scary and painful but it was all aver with her in depth sessions and healing modalities. Whether it was same blockage as a past life or some other hindrance as external forces she was able to manage it all with Gods blessings and angels by her side. I am truly and sincerely thankful to her and I do feel blessed to have her as my mentor, friend, guide, healer and therapist.

Thank you so much.
With much love and gratitude.

4.author: Sreya
4.message:
Monisha is rather intuitive, and someone who remains positive even when delivering not such great news. The great thing about doing a reading with her is that she is patient, and encourages you to ask as many question as you like. I found that she also leaves one full of hope, a rare ability.

She was very accurate about her predictions about not just my past but also present circumstances. Of course time will tell about the future-facing predictions but she is a lady who inspires much confidence. So much so that I took my husband to her for a reading too!

5.author: Anupama
5.message: Monisha is so good. Absolutely accurate with predictions. Spends plenty of time with you and listens with all patience. A very good counselor. She is filled with positive vibes. I highly recommend her.

6.author: Poonamjeet
6.message: Monisha is the best of all the tarot card readers I have come across. Passionate, very soft spoken, with an amazing healing touch and above all a wonderful human being. Tarot reading is her passion and is non commercial. Monisha, thanx for your accurate readings, your support, and guidance. May God bless you 🙂

7.author: Alekhya
7.message: Predictions about past were fully accurate. Tarot reading helped in gaining insight in the future. Very articulate which is very important to a tarot reader. Will make an extra effort to not only help gain perspective about the future but will also give solutions to it. Will definitely go back to her.

8.author: Dhruv Bedi
8.message: Hello. Just want to share my experience. I got one of my left hand finger sprained really badly a month ago. I applied medicines but didn’t get any good response. Pain was still there I started tying crepe bandages but pain went for a while and then came again. Yesterday Monisha ma’am gave me Reiki for some time and after 5 minutes pain was gone 40 percent and now by my hand is perfect and not used crepe bandage since yesterday and still my hand is fine. Thank you ma’am and thank you Reiki . 🙂

9.author: Pooja Malhotra
9.message: Hi monisha… Can not thank ” Just dail 🙂 enough for connecting us. A few months back I found myself standing alone on cross road of life I booked a reiki session with monisha! Post that I have started looking at my life from a different angle. She is not only a great healer , her tarot predictions are most accurate, she has superb patience and to top it all she became a great friend. I have full faith n trust in her. I wish her the best in her life.

10.author: Anupama Srivastava
10.message: Monisha is truely a master intuitive and startingly accurate with her predictions through tarot and numerology and astro analysis. She is very knowledgeable with astrology principles, and can translate them very well into simple real life advice, in combination with her tarot readings and intuitive counseling. She is an excellent life coach, and interacts with every client in a caring and genuinely friendly way. Her client involvement is exemplary and she is truely a gifted life coach, counselor and Tarot-Reiki expert. She gave practical & innovative solutions & patiently explained the reasons for adopting them. She is a great professional. She is the best example of how accurate & wonderful Tarot Reading is. I contacted Monisha earlier this year in Feb when I needed to talk to someone who could give me more than just a pep talk and motivation speech. This is when I had two extensive conversations with her which gave me a new perspective. I like her clarity of thought and lucidity which makes it simpler to share doubts and issues knowing she can be trusted with them completely. I am really happy to have been introduced to Monisha the Reiki Healer, Numerologist, Tarot reader friend and guide…I cherish & value the association for its simplicity and selfless dedication! Monisha is amazing with her knowledge and skills, her guidance has given me immediate results. Her understanding towards problem is very realistic and empathetic. She is very reliable, warm to approach. She is dedicated to her task, ready to walk along with you to show you results. I recommend Monisha to all those who wish to seek guidance to do their best in life. She is a power packet of knowledge, compassion and a very humane approach. I wish her all the best in her future endeavour

11.author: Parul Airen
11.message: I have been to Monisha for consultation in Tarot and Palmistry, and have found her reading very intuitive and accurate. She has a calm persona which quickly puts you at ease. She is a good listener and spends as much time as needed.

12.author: Sumedha Kandhari
12.message: The first time I met Monisha as a client , I found her gifted with a strong intuitive power and positive aura which gave her an edge over other professionals. She not only predicts with accurately but helps your awaken your own inner strength to deal with your problems. She goes an extra mile to help her clients so as to provide the best possible solutions to the problems. I have been so much fascinated by her knowledge and the expertise that I also got inclined to the subject and started learning it from her. She has surely shown the direction to my life; be it professional or personal life. I am very glad to have met, consulted and have her as my guide.

13.author: Ujjaini Sengupta
13.message: Monisha is an amazing tarot reader. I have had a couple of tarot sessions with her. She is very calm and positive and also very soft spoken. The best part about her is apart from providing mostly accurate tarot readings, she also suggests simple and effective ways to counter any problems. I definitely recommend her. 🙂

14.author: Arjun
14.message: It was a very good reading that really answered all of my questions. She has a unique way of studying the cards that ensures all your questions are answered and you attain the clarity that you desire. I would recommend her to anyone desiring a tarot card reading.

15.author: Nitika Aggarwal
15.message:
Monisha Bhatia is a commendable human being and an amazing person. Saying through my personal experience, her mastery over clinical hypnosis and past life regression therapy has helped me heal my family issues that I had been facing from last so many years. She is undoubtedly the best healer who has an exceptional knowledge of astrology too!

She is recognised with many awards in astrology and is a member of Astrology federation and she surely deserves it all.

Apart from this, she is very intelligent, analytical and possesses an energetic personality. She is a patient listener whose aura itself can make you feel optimistic. She has been a great help to me and I am nothing but truly grateful to her.

16.author: Liza
16.message: I found her very articulate and helpful for giving answers to whatever questions I had. About the predictions, we will see soon. but I definitely would want to get back to her…

17.author: Geeti
17.message: There was a point in my life where I wanted to turn to someone who was unknown to me and cud therefore give me a perspective of the real definition to my life. That’s where u came into the picture and made it easy for me to look through imperfections and help me give a shape to my life and realize my true worth. Thank you for your wonderful serene tarot reading.. It not only gave me hope but made me an all the more positive person. You are best at what you do and you have a gift of lifting up the spirits of someone whose lost in translation! Once again.. thank you:-))

18.author: Debamitra
18.message: Monisha is an extremely talented and knowledgeable guide. Having been a repeated beneficiary of her skills and natural intuition I have no hesitation in recommending her to others and I do it very often too. She is a warm-hearted person who genuinely cares for and empathisizes with those who come to her for guidance. Thanks to the beautiful and kind relationship that I have with her, I now count upon Monisha as one of my closest friends today.

19.author: Kailash Batra
19.message: Wished to inform you that after having healing sessions from you, I feel much lighter and my Asthma problem has also reduced, Can play Badminton without getting out of breath, Thank you, May God bless you and you continue to heal all.

20.author: Amrit Sinha
20.message: Monisha is a very good Tarot reader and Reiki healer. She is very devoted and very good and does right predictions. She is a good teacher also .. She has devoted her life for tarot, Reiki, numerology, astrology, palmistry, and needy people.

21.author: Rohitt Sharma
21.message: My name is Rohitt Sharma and I live in New Delhi, Janakpuri. I would like to write a few lines, as I am especially thankful to Mrs. Monisha Bhatia because of her way of helping me and giving wonderful suggestions and remedies. I have now started getting results of my works. I was going through a difficult period in my life, I have met many obstacles and negative things in life. It blocked my success in life, such as in my career but she is helping me to work out smoothly. I was born with a different name but now I got changed with my new name which I really like. A very famous writer Shakespeare said “what is in a name?” but I must say there are lots of secrets in one’s name. It need to be corrected, though things didn’t change overnight but I strongly believe the energy of name of a person of course helps to bring the life in different good ways. Thank you so much for all the greatest helps that you’ve been provided to me. I’m really appreciated for your helps. Regards

22.author: Saurabh Kumar Rai
22.message: Fantastic first hand experience ! All the best !

24.author: Piyush Shakula
24.message: I took this type of session for the first time, good experience, just awesome!.

25.author: Varun Kumar
25.message: How can someone say so much truth! Simply great!.

26.author: Maneesh Talwar
26.message: Monisha gave me worthful information about my life.

27.author: Poonam Mehra
27.message: I have received an excellent overview of my life through Monisha.

28.author: Ajay Wahi
28.message: Ms Monisha Bhatia is an excellent astrologer and a numerologist. Thank you Monishaji

29.author: Rajesh
29.message: I visited Monisha Bhatia several times because of her honest and sincere nature in profession. Her predictions about me and my family members came true day by day. I wish her all the best

30.author: Deepak B. Khanna
30.message: I browsed Jusdial website and spoke to many listed consultants before shortlisting Monisha Bhatia as a tarot reader for my queries and I haven`t consulted any other after meeting her. She charges a very nominal fee for consultations. She has been one of the most comprehensive readers I have been to. Her predictions are pretty much accurate and she would utilize all her knowledge in the fields of occult- tarot, numerology, astrology, dowsing, angel healing, reiki etc. to help you provide solutions to your most urgent and difficult situations. The remedies she suggested were very reasonable and effective. One of the very best occultist that I have met in the recent times. I wish her all the best in her endeavor. Thank you Monisha and thank you Justdial.
